pullRequest.title: Moved NUI into a separate library
pullRequest.bodyText:
Belongs to #2307
Base PR introducing the NUI extraction by @BenjaminAmos in #3819 .
This PR adds a feature branch for joint effort to get this in.

How to run ...
To test this PR with some gameplay you'll need to checkout the respective NUI extraction branches for the Iota module line-up.
Information about getting suitable versions of the modules to test with is in the description of 4048.
Check out this PR for the engine (e.g., with Github CLI tool):
gh pr checkout 4017

... with TeraNUI Artifact
TeraNUI v1.x is automatically published from MovingBlocks/TeraNUI now. Thus, testing this PR should work without a local copy of TeraNUI. This will use the published artifact as specified in the engine's build.gradle
... with TeraNUI from source
Get TeraNUI as source dependency via
groovyw lib get TeraNUI
# check out v1 branch
cd libs/TeraNUI
git checkout release/v1.x
Other notes including test plans are in 3819.

Co-authored-by: Benjamin Amos benjamin.amos11@gmail.com
Co-authored-by: Cervator cervator@gmail.com
Co-authored-by: Kevin Blaszczyk OrcHound@gmail.com
Co-authored-by: Kevin Turner 83819+keturn@users.noreply.github.com
Co-authored-by: Michael polli104@mail.chapman.edu
Co-authored-by: Rostyslav Zatserkovnyi zatserkovnyi.rostyslav@gmail.com
Co-authored-by: Tobias Nett skaldarnar@googlemail.com

commit.message: Initial removal of NUI code (moved to library).
Moved Border class to TeraNUI.
Fixed UI Tabbing.

Fixed compile error with TeraEd facade.

An import statement was removed in a previous commit that was needed.
Moved org.terasology.reflections to another library.
Fixed sound on button click and an engine test.
Fixed engine tests.

Re-implemented drawing meshes on UI (fix for Inventory module).

NUI does not expose this functionality anymore, so it is instead re-directed to Terasology's implementation via CanvasUtility, as CanvasImpl does not have an @API annotation (it is a private API).
Removed usage of Terasology input (entity-system) events in NUI.
Re-added support for rendering materials to canvas via CanvasUtility.
Re-added UIDeltaFormat (as it implies a JSON file format, like UIFormat).
Fixed compile errors and removed duplicate FontColor and FontUnderline classes (moved to NUI).
Added some additional methods removed from Canvas to CanvasUtility.
Moved CanvasImpl (as well as its associated classes) to NUI.
Merge branch 'nui-extraction' of https://github.com/BenjaminAmos/Terasology into BenjaminAmos-nui-extraction
fix: reintroduce rendering/dag files, fix import issues
Fix imports
Fix issues related to Joml vector conversion
Add utility functions for rectangle conversion to JomlUtil
Fix issues related to Joml rectangle conversion
Merge branch 'develop' into feat/nui-extraction

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into feat/nui-extraction

# Conflicts:
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/math/JomlUtil.java
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/persistence/typeHandling/extensionTypes/ColorTypeHandler.java
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/rendering/nui/AbstractWidget.java
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/rendering/nui/layouts/ScrollableArea.java
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/rendering/nui/widgets/UIRadialRing.java
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/rendering/nui/widgets/UIScrollingText.java
chore: linting 🚮

Converted Terasology UI widgets to JOML. Fixed crash on game start.

Temporarily introduced MouseDevice.getMousePosition to fix JOML TeraMath incompatibilities.

Merge pull request #4048 from BenjaminAmos/nui-extraction-runtime-fixes

feat/nui-extraction branch: Make the game playable again

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into feat/nui-extraction

# Conflicts:
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/math/JomlUtil.java
fix: use joml 1.9.25 method names
Merge branch 'develop' into feat/nui-extraction

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/develop' into feat/nui-extraction

# Conflicts:
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/logic/nameTags/NameTagComponent.java
#	engine/src/main/java/org/terasology/rendering/iconmesh/IconMeshFactory.java
chore: Tweak target version for extracted NUI

chore: Adjustments needed for various engine changes since last merge

* CanvasRenderer in the extracted NUI had a new method added, implemented it twice here to compile (but one may need a legit implementation if desired)
* Some JOML adjustments
* Adjust for Border now living in the extracted NUI

commit.message: chore: build with TeraNUI v1.1.0-SNAPSHOT for testing

nodes.bodyText: RectUtility::createFromMinAndSize and in turn Border#shrink can produce invalid Rectangle2i (e.g, by RectUtility.createFromMinAndSize(20, 20, -10, -10)). I'm not sure where/how we want to fix this... @pollend ?

commit.message: test: fix `growBorderMax` test by removing JomlUtil conversion
move tests to MovingBlocks/TeraNUI#15
fix: update TeraNUI dependency to 1.1.0 release.

chore: update TeraMath dependency to 1.5.0 release.

This is an upgrade from current develop branch (at 1.4.0) but a small step back from earlier versions of this PR (had 1.5.1-SNAPSHOT)
